org.xbib.elasticsearch.gatherer
Interface IndexableObject

All Superinterfaces:
Comparable<IndexableObject>
All Known Implementing Classes:
PlainIndexableObject
public interface IndexableObject
extends Comparable<IndexableObject>

A structured object is composed by an object data source together with meta data about the object.
